caption:
“Seek not escape, but encounter.”

Reflection:
The pilgrim doesn’t flee — he finds. Every journey outward leads inward to God’s waiting presence.

Commentary:
This line reminds us that spirituality isn’t withdrawal, but awareness. The goal is not distance from the world but deeper engagement with it.
